response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 14000}
